sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-text-field
      v-model="title"
      label="Title"
      outlined
      filled
      clearable
      :rules="rules.required"
    ></v-text-field>
    <v-textarea
      v-model="body"
      outlined
      filled
      auto-grow
    ></v-textarea>
    <v-btn v-on:click="postNote(); $root.$emit('event', note);" color="teal lighten-1" dark> Save </v-btn>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import axios from "axios";

export default {
  name: "NoteAdd",

  data: function () {
    return {
      title: null,
      body: null,
      formValid: false,
      rules: {
        required: [value => !!value || "Required."]
      }
    };
  },

  methods: {
    postNote: function () {
      axios.post("http://localhost:3000/notes", {
        title: this.title,
        body: this.body,
      })
      this.title = ""
      this.body = ""
    },
  },

  mounted() {
    this.$refs.title.validate()
  }
};
</script>
